material.tinkersnh.energetic_alloy.encyc: Each level of the Energetic Alloy increases the mining speed and attack speed by 5%
material.tinkersnh.energetic_alloy.range: Each level of the Energetic Alloy increases the mining speed and attack speed by 5%
material.tinkersnh.energetic_alloy.armor: Each level of the Energetic Alloy increases the movement speed by 5%
modifier.tinkersnh.energetic_tool.descri: The gold has been charged with energy, making it faster for mining and firing arrows.
modifier.tinkersnh.energetic_armor.descr: You feel the power of the gold, and you can move faster than ever before.
material.tinkersnh.uelibloom.flavor: Fossilized tree bark is bursting through the jungle's mud!
material.tinkersnh.uelibloom.encyclopedi: Increases maximum health by one heart per level.
material.tinkersnh.uelibloom.armor: Revives upon death with full health but reduces maximum health by one heart; blessing deactivates when revive count exceeds current blessing level.
modifier.tinkersnh.blessing_of_life_armo: Life surges through your veins, making you feel invincible!
Revives by consuming maximum health when receiving lethal damage.
modifier.tinkersnh.blessing_of_life_tool: Jungle-forged metal mystically enhances your vitality
Increases maximum health by one heart per level
modifier.tinkersnh.gravitic_amplificatio: The era where only axes could break shields is over!
Equipment damage increases by 40%, gains shield breaking ability, and gains Slow II when held.
